channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today Bible Q&A
channel.desc: Many claim that the Bible is unreliable because it was written and altered by man; this is a notion the devil would be delighted for everyone to accept.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Kids Camp Kitchen Fun
channel.desc: Host Cinda Sanner prepares different recipes for the young campers to showcase their cooking skills in the kitchen.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Tiny Tots Kitchen
channel.desc: Host Cinda Sanner teaches the children how to create fun recipes and cook healthy, delicious meals together.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Tiny Tots Worship
channel.desc: Host Cinda Sanner helps children learn more about Jesus through singing worship songs, arts and crafts and storytelling sessions.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Sanctuary Salvation & Our Savior
channel.desc: One of the symbolisms of the altar of incense is the prayers of God's people; after one is born again, one is to breath through prayer; just as when one is born physically one takes one's first breath; host David Shin.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: IIW Sabbath School
channel.desc: The host, along with a panel of religious scholars, conduct various discussions to provide an in-depth insight into various topics from the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Spotless
channel.desc: Shelley Quinn examines the Lord's announcement of His everlasting covenant in the Garden following the entrance of sin.
